testcase.name: createProduct_checkId_ShouldReturnNewProduct()
testcase.system-out: 17:40:48.707 - [OnlineshopApiClient] INFO : Initiated petclinic.api.onlineshop.OnlineshopApiClient instance amount : 100.00 name : SHUBHANGI currency : INR id : 71 17:40:49.510 - [ApiCaller] INFO : Request: Request URI: http://petclinicapi.e46708b92c054086909b.eastus.aksapp.io/petclinic/api/shop/addtocart/ Body: {"name":"SHUBHANGI","currency":"INR","id":"71","amount":"100.00","quantity":0} 17:41:20.339 - [ApiCaller] INFO : Response: HTTP/1.1 200 {"id":71,"name":"SHUBHANGI","amount":100.00,"quantity":1,"currency":"INR"}
